turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about German submarine U-1308.
turn.1: What was the difference between the periscope and the searchlight?
turn.2: The observation periscope had two magnifications – 1.5× and 6×.
turn.3: What was the function of the attack periscope?
turn.4: The attack periscope was used exclusively for that purpose.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: To make it less visible to the enemy and to reduce the wake, the periscope head and neck-size were keep to a minimum.
turn.7: Were there any other different types of periscopes?
turn.8: The attack periscope was fitted with a heating system that served to prevent fogging of the lenses.
turn.10: "U-1308"s Direction Finder Antenna Loop was located on the starboard side of the bridge.
turn.11: What was the purpose of the DF antenna?
turn.12: It was used to detect and get bearings from the radio signals of Allied surface ships.
